de.bitbrain.braingdx.input

Class MovementInputControllerListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.ControllerAdapter
      • de.bitbrain.braingdx.input.MovementInputControllerListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.ControllerListener, Updateable

    public class MovementInputControllerListener
extends com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.ControllerAdapter
implements Updateable
    Changes a Movement depending on trigger position. This can be changed with the MovementInputControllerListener.Mode which defualts to both.
    Since:
    0.4.10
